column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Here is what you do: walk inside. There will be a big cluster near the front
column2: and you will be unsure if there is an actual line or not. Find the employee holding the iPad
column3: and give him your name. He will tell you the wait time
column4: and then you put your order in at the front register. You will also give him your phone number
column5: as they call your cell when your table is open.
